typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ISODateTimeUTC as string,
		Lat as double,
		Lon as double,
		SOG as double,
		COG as double,
		TWD as double,
		TWA as double,
		VMG as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(ISODateTimeUTC = toTimestamp(concat(substring(ISODateTimeUTC,0,10),' ',substring(ISODateTimeUTC,12,8)),'yyyy-mm-dd HH:mm:ss')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Cleanedcsvfile_timestamp'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
